_meta.source: Researched from Wellington tourism, Te Papa, and New Zealand cruise guides

bbox_hint.note: Covers terminal, Te Papa, Cuba Street, Cable Car

transit_routes.name: Walk to Downtown
transit_routes.note: Scenic waterfront walk to Te Papa and city center.

transit_routes.name: Shuttle to Downtown
transit_routes.note: Many cruise lines offer complimentary shuttles to downtown.

featured_experiences.name: Te Papa Tongarewa
featured_experiences.note: New Zealand's national museum. Free general admission.

featured_experiences.name: Wellington Cable Car
featured_experiences.note: Iconic red funicular. NZ$5-10 each way.

featured_experiences.name: Weta Workshop
featured_experiences.note: Studio behind Lord of the Rings. Book in advance.
